    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot parse(String template)
        Parse the TOSCA template (string) and get the in-memory representation. This also checks for validation errors.
        Parameters:
        template - the TOSCA template as string.
        Returns:
        an ArchiveRoot representing the template..
        Throws:
        ToscaException - if validation errors occur.

      • parse

        public alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot parse(String filePath,
                                                 String fileName,
                                                 String template)
        Parse the TOSCA template (string) and get the in-memory representation. This also checks for validation errors.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the TOSCA template file.
        fileName - the name of the TOSCA template file.
        template - the TOSCA template as string.
        Returns:
        an ArchiveRoot representing the template..
        Throws:
        ToscaException - if validation errors occur.

      • serialize

        public String serialize(alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot archiveRoot)
        Obtain the string TOSCA template representation from the in-memory representation.
        Parameters:
        archiveRoot - the ArchiveRoot from which serialize the TOSCA template
        Returns:
        the serialized TOSCA template
